plot: Woody, exasperated at continually having to pay rent, encounters a leprechaun woodpecker who grants him three wishes.
title: His Better Elf
plot_es: Woody, exasperated at continually having to pay rent, encounters a leprechaun woodpecker who grants him three wishes.
plot_en: Woody, exasperated at continually having to pay rent, encounters a leprechaun woodpecker who grants him three wishes.
